00063 const int RADIO = 120;
00064 
00065 HorizontalWidget::HorizontalWidget( QWidget* parent )
00066 :QWidget( parent ), m_azimuth( 0 ), m_zenith( 0 )
00067 {
00068         QVBoxLayout* mainLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00069         setLayout( mainLayout );
00070         
00071         QWidget* examinerWidget = new QWidget;
00072         examinerWidget->setFixedSize( 490, 300 );
00073         mainLayout->addWidget(examinerWidget);
00074         
00075         m_rootNode = new SoSeparator;
00076         
00077         m_rootNode->addChild( Ejes( ) );
00078         m_rootNode->addChild( Text() ); 
00079     m_rootNode->addChild( Sphere() );
00080         m_rootNode->addChild( Horizon( RADIO ) );
00081         m_rootNode->addChild( AzimuthLine() );
00082         m_rootNode->addChild( ZenithLine() );
00083     m_rootNode->addChild( Star() ); 
00084     
00085         SoQtExaminerViewer* myRenderArea = new SoQtExaminerViewer( examinerWidget );
00086     myRenderArea->setSceneGraph( m_rootNode );
00087     SbColor col( 0.86f, 0.86f, 0.86f );
00088     myRenderArea->setBackgroundColor(col);
00089     myRenderArea->show(  );
00090     
00091      QWidget* labelsWidget = new QWidget;
00092     mainLayout->addWidget( labelsWidget );
00093  
00094         QGridLayout* labelsLayout = new QGridLayout;
00095         labelsWidget->setLayout( labelsLayout );
00096         
00097         QLabel* m_AzimuthLabel = new QLabel;
00098         m_AzimuthLabel->setText( "Azimuth:" );
00099         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_AzimuthLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1 );
00100         
00101         m_azimuthValue = new QLabel;
00102         m_azimuthValue->setText( QString::number( m_azimuth ) );
00103         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_azimuthValue, 0, 1, 1, 3  );
00104         
00105         QLabel* m_zenithLabel = new QLabel;
00106         m_zenithLabel->setText( "Zenith:" );
00107         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_zenithLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1 );
00108         
00109         m_zenithValue = new QLabel;
00110         m_zenithValue->setText( QString::number( m_zenith ) );
00111         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_zenithValue, 1, 1, 1, 3 );
00112         
00113 }

00120 void HorizontalWidget::CoordinatesChanged( cSunCoordinates coordinates )
00121 {
00122         m_azimuth = coordinates.dAzimuth;
00123         m_azimuthValue->setText( QString::number( m_azimuth ) );
00124         m_zenith = coordinates.dZenithAngle;
00125         m_zenithValue->setText( QString::number( m_zenith ) );
00126         
00127         //Azimuth Line update
00128         SoSeparator* azimuth = AzimuthLine();
00129         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 4, azimuth );
00130         
00131         //Zenith Line update
00132         SoSeparator* zenith = ZenithLine();
00133         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 5, zenith );
00134         
00135         //Star update
00136         SoSeparator* star = Star();
00137         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 6, star );
00138 }
00139 
00140 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::AzimuthLine()
00141 {
00142         //Azimuth Line
00143         SoSeparator* azimuth = new SoSeparator; 
00144         
00145         SoSeparator* azimuthLine = new SoSeparator; 
00146         azimuth->addChild( azimuthLine );
00147         
00148         SoMaterial* azimuthMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00149         azimuthMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0, 1.0, 0.0 );   // Green
00150         azimuthLine->addChild( azimuthMaterial );
00151         
00152         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00153         drawstyle->lineWidth = 3;
00154         azimuthLine->addChild( drawstyle );
00155         
00156         
00157         float azimuthPoints[360][3];
00158         for( int fi = 0; fi < 360; fi++ )
00159         {
00160                 double grad = ( m_azimuth / 360 ) * fi;
00161                 azimuthPoints[fi][0] = sin( grad * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* RADIO ;
00162         azimuthPoints[fi][1] =  0.0;
00163         azimuthPoints[fi][2] = -cos( grad * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO ;
00164                 
00165         }
00166         
00167         int azimuthLines[1] = {360};
00168         SoCoordinate3 * azimuthCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00169         azimuthCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 360, azimuthPoints );
00170         azimuthLine->addChild( azimuthCoord3 );
00171                 
00172         SoLineSet* line=new SoLineSet;
00173         line->numVertices.setValues( 0, 1, azimuthLines );
00174         azimuthLine->addChild( line );
00175         
00176         
00177         SoSeparator* curve = new SoSeparator;
00178         azimuth->addChild( curve );
00179         
00180         SoMaterial* curveMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00181         curveMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f );   // Green
00182         curve->addChild( curveMaterial );
00183         
00184         float curvePoints[270][3];
00185         Point3D center( 0, 0, 0 );
00186 
00187         int numPoints = 0;
00188         int indexes[360];
00189         for( int index = 1; index <= 90; index ++ )
00190         {
00191                 curvePoints[numPoints][0]= center.x;
00192                 curvePoints[numPoints][1]= center.y;
00193                 curvePoints[numPoints][2]= center.z;
00194                 indexes[ ( index -1 ) * 4 ] = numPoints;
00195                 numPoints++;
00196                 
00197                 double grad1 = ( m_azimuth / 360 ) * 4 * ( index -1 );
00198                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad1 * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* RADIO ;
00199         curvePoints[numPoints][1] =  0.0;
00200         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = -cos( grad1 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO ;
00201         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +1 ] = numPoints;
00202                 numPoints++;
00203                 
00204                 double grad2 = ( m_azimuth / 360 ) * 4 * index;
00205                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* RADIO ;
00206         curvePoints[numPoints][1] =  0.0;
00207         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = -cos( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO ;
00208         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +2 ] = numPoints;
00209                 numPoints++;
00210                 
00211                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) + 3 ] = -1;
00212         
00213         }
00214         
00215         
00216         SoCoordinate3 * curveCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00217         curveCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 270, curvePoints );
00218         curve->addChild( curveCoord3 );
00219         
00220         SoIndexedFaceSet* facet = new SoIndexedFaceSet;
00221         facet->coordIndex.setValues( 0, 360, indexes );
00222         curve->addChild( facet );
00223         
00224         return azimuth;
00225 }
00226 
00227 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::Ejes() const
00228 {
00229         SoSeparator* ejes = new SoSeparator;
00230         
00231         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00232         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);   // Red
00233         ejes->addChild(myMaterial);
00234         
00235         float p[6][3]={{0.0, 0.0, 0.0}, 
00236                                         {RADIO+20, 0.0, 0.0},
00237                                         {0.0, 0.0, 0.0},
00238                                         {0.0, RADIO+20, 0.0},
00239                                         {0.0, 0.0, 0.0}, 
00240                                         {0.0, 0.0, RADIO+20}};
00241 
00242         SoCoordinate3* coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00243         coord3->point.setValues(0, 6, p);
00244         ejes->addChild(coord3);
00245         
00246         int lines[3]={2,2, 2};
00247         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00248         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,3,lines);
00249         ejes->addChild(lineset);
00250 
00251         return ejes;
00252 
00253 }
00254 
00255 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::Horizon( int r ) const
00256 {
00257         float p[360][3];
00258         for( int fi = 0; fi<360; fi++ )
00259         {
00260                 p[fi][0] = -sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) )*r ;
00261         p[fi][1] =  0.0;
00262         p[fi][2] = -cos( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) )*r ;
00263                 
00264         }
00265         
00266         int lines[1]={360};
00267         SoCoordinate3 * coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00268         coord3->point.setValues(0, 360, p);
00269         SoSeparator* ecuador = new SoSeparator;
00270         ecuador->addChild(coord3);
00271                 
00272         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00273         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,1,lines);
00274         ecuador->addChild(lineset);     
00275         
00276         return ecuador;
00277 
00278         
00279 }

00281 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget ::Sphere() const
00282 {
00283         SoSeparator* sph = new SoSeparator;
00284   
00285         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00286         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );   // Blue
00287         myMaterial->transparency.setValue( 0.3f );
00288         sph->addChild( myMaterial );
00289         
00290         SoComplexity* complexity = new SoComplexity;
00291         complexity->value = 0.5;
00292         sph->addChild( complexity );
00293         
00294         SoSphere* sphere=new SoSphere;
00295         sphere->radius = RADIO;
00296         sph->addChild(sphere);
00297 
00298         return sph;
00299 }
00300 
00301 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::Star() 
00302 {               
00303         //Star definition
00304         SoSeparator* star = new SoSeparator;
00305         
00306         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00307         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 1.0, 0.0);   // yellow
00308         star->addChild(myMaterial);
00309         
00310         SoTranslation* starTransform = new SoTranslation;
00311         starTransform->translation.setValue( sin( m_zenith * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* sin( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO, 
00312                 cos( m_zenith * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO, 
00313                 -sin( m_zenith * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* cos( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) )  * RADIO ) ;
00314         star->addChild( starTransform);
00315         
00316         SoSphere* sphere=new SoSphere;
00317         sphere->radius=10;
00318         star->addChild(sphere);
00319         
00320         return star; 
00321 
00322 }

00324 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::Text(){
00325         
00326         SoSeparator* text = new SoSeparator;
00327         
00328         SoMaterial* myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00329         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 1.0, 0.0, 0.0 );   // Red
00330         text->addChild( myMaterial );
00331         
00332         SoSeparator* norte = new SoSeparator;
00333         SoTransform* norteTransf = new SoTransform;
00334         norteTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( 0, 0, -( RADIO+30) ) );
00335         norte->addChild( norteTransf ); 
00336                 
00337         SoText3* northText= new SoText3();
00338         northText->string.setValue("N");
00339         northText->justification = SoText3::CENTER;
00340         northText->parts = SoText3::ALL;
00341         norte->addChild( northText );
00342         text->addChild( norte );
00343         
00344         SoSeparator* south = new SoSeparator;
00345         SoTransform* southTransf = new SoTransform;
00346         southTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( 0, 0, ( RADIO+30 ) ) );
00347         south->addChild( southTransf ); 
00348                 
00349         SoText3* southText = new SoText3();
00350         southText->string.setValue("S");
00351         southText->justification = SoText3::CENTER;
00352         southText->parts = SoText3::ALL;
00353         south->addChild( southText );
00354         text->addChild( south );        
00355         
00356         SoSeparator* east = new SoSeparator;
00357         SoTransform* eastTransf = new SoTransform;
00358         eastTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( ( RADIO+30 ), 0.0, 0.0 ) );
00359         east->addChild( eastTransf ); 
00360                 
00361         SoText3* eastText = new SoText3();
00362         eastText->string.setValue("E");
00363         eastText->justification = SoText3::CENTER;
00364         eastText->parts = SoText3::ALL;
00365         east->addChild( eastText );
00366         text->addChild( east );
00367         
00368         SoSeparator* west = new SoSeparator;
00369         SoTransform* westTransf = new SoTransform;
00370         westTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( -( RADIO+30 ), 0.0, 0.0 ) );
00371         west->addChild( westTransf ); 
00372                 
00373         SoText3* westText = new SoText3();
00374         westText->string.setValue("W");
00375         westText->justification = SoText3::CENTER;
00376         westText->parts = SoText3::ALL;
00377         west->addChild( westText );
00378         text->addChild( west );
00379 
00380         return text;
00381 }
00382 
00383 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::ZenithLine()
00384 {
00385         
00386         SoSeparator* zenith = new SoSeparator; 
00387         
00388         SoMaterial* zenithMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00389         zenithMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0, 1.0, 0.0 );   // Green
00390         zenith->addChild( zenithMaterial );
00391         
00392         //Zenith Line
00393         SoSeparator* zenithLine = new SoSeparator;
00394         zenith->addChild( zenithLine );
00395         
00396         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00397         drawstyle->lineWidth = 4;
00398         zenithLine->addChild( drawstyle );
00399         
00400         float zenithPoints[360][3];
00401         
00402         double fi = m_azimuth;
00403         for( int theta = 0; theta< 360; theta++ )
00404         {
00405                 double grad = ( m_zenith / 360 ) * theta;
00406                 zenithPoints[theta][0] = sin( grad * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* RADIO;
00407         zenithPoints[theta][1] = cos( grad  * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO;
00408         zenithPoints[theta][2] = -sin( grad * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * cos( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO ;
00409         }
00410         
00411         
00412         int zenithLines[1] = {360};
00413         SoCoordinate3 * zenithCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00414         zenithCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 360, zenithPoints );
00415         zenithLine->addChild( zenithCoord3 );
00416         
00417         SoLineSet* line=new SoLineSet;
00418         line->numVertices.setValues( 0, 1, zenithLines );
00419         zenithLine->addChild( line );
00420         
00421         //Surface
00422         SoSeparator* curve = new SoSeparator;
00423         zenith->addChild( curve );
00424         
00425         float curvePoints[270][3];
00426         Point3D center( 0, 0, 0 );
00427 
00428         int numPoints = 0;
00429         int indexes[360];
00430         for( int index = 1; index <= 90; index ++ )
00431         {
00432                 curvePoints[numPoints][0]= center.x;
00433                 curvePoints[numPoints][1]= center.y;
00434                 curvePoints[numPoints][2]= center.z;
00435                 indexes[ ( index -1 ) * 4 ] = numPoints;
00436                 numPoints++;
00437                 
00438                 double grad1 = ( m_zenith / 360 ) * 4 * (index -1 );
00439                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad1 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sin( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* RADIO;
00440         curvePoints[numPoints][1] = cos( grad1  * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO;
00441         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = -sin( grad1 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * cos( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO ;
00442         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +1 ] = numPoints;
00443                 numPoints++;
00444                 
00445                 double grad2 = ( m_zenith / 360 ) * 4 * index;
00446                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sin( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* RADIO;
00447         curvePoints[numPoints][1] = cos( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO;
00448         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = -sin( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * cos( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO ;
00449         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +2 ] = numPoints;
00450                 numPoints++;
00451                 
00452                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) + 3 ] = -1;
00453         
00454         }
00455         
00456         
00457         SoCoordinate3 * curveCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00458         curveCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 270, curvePoints );
00459         curve->addChild( curveCoord3 );
00460         
00461         SoIndexedFaceSet* facet = new SoIndexedFaceSet;
00462         facet->coordIndex.setValues( 0, 360, indexes );
00463         curve->addChild( facet );
00464         
00465         
00466         return zenith;
00467 }
